import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function CreateProducts() { const [formErrors, setFormErrors] = useState(); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getCategory(); }, []) const getCategory = () => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/products/all', { method: "GET", headers: { authorization: 'Bearer ' + window.localStorage.getItem('token') }, }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => { // console.log(res); setCategories(res); }) } return (

Create Category

Back

    { formErrors?.title }

    {formErrors?.category}

    {formErrors?.price}

    {formErrors?.discount}

    {formErrors?.discount_price}

    {formErrors?.discount_date}

    {formErrors?.image}

    {formErrors?.description}
) } export default CreateProducts
